event.executesql: BACKUP DATABASE [BanklinePreviousMonthEnd] TO DISK='X:\Backup\MonthEnd\BanklinePreviousMonthEnd_Save.bak' WITH NOFORMAT, INIT, name='BanklinePreviousMonthEnd-Full Database Backup', STATS = 1
BACKUP DATABASE [BanklineCurrentMonthEnd] TO DISK='X:\Backup\MonthEnd\BanklineCurrentMonthEnd_Save.bak' WITH NOFORMAT, INIT, name='BanklineCurrentMonthEnd-Full Database Backup', STATS = 1
